named-query.name: notas.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from CedulaNota o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: notas.by.usuario.seguimiento
named-query.query: select distinct o from CedulaNota o join fetch o.comentarioHallazgos a where a.usuario.usuId=?1 and o.regActivo=1 and (o.cedEstado=9 or o.cedEstado=10 or o.cedEstado=11)

named-query.name: notas.by.usuario
named-query.query: select distinct o from CedulaNota o join fetch o.comentarioHallazgos a where a.usuario.usuId=?1 and o.regActivo=1 and (o.cedEstado=4 or o.cedEstado=5 or o.cedEstado=6)

named-query.name: recomedaciones.by.nota
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.cedulaNota.cedId=?1 and o.auditoria.audId=?2 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: evidencia.cedula
named-query.query: select o from Evidencia o where o.cedula.cedId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: evidencia.comentario
named-query.query: select o from Evidencia o where o.comentarioHallazgo.comeId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: comentarios.by.cedula
named-query.query: select distinct o from ComentarioHallazgo o left join fetch o.evidencia where o.cedulaNota.cedId=?1 and o.regActivo=1
